home.searchContent: Enter property information to locate a property and view property details.

propertySearch.searchBoxError: Enter at least 3 characters to get started

expirePINConfirmationModal.title: Expire PIN
expirePINConfirmationModal.body: The current PIN will be void and the property owner will need to request a new PIN to manage the VHERS portal.

expirePINSuccessModal.title: PIN has been expired
expirePINSuccessModal.body: The property owner will not be able to access VHERS system until a new PIN is requested.

expirePINFailureModal.title: Expiring PIN failed
expirePINFailureModal.body: There was a problem. Try again later.
